function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential skepticism towards the performance of the eco-friendly face mask","Impact":"Low adoption and utilization of the eco-friendly face mask, leading to continued environmental damage from disposable face masks","Mitigation":"Conducting consumer education and awareness campaigns to highlight the effectiveness and benefits of the eco-friendly face mask","Technologies":"Social media, influencer marketing, educational content","People":"Consumers, general public","Owner":"Marketing and communication teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","Impact":"Environmental pollution and lack of fulfillment of the eco-friendly promise","Mitigation":"Research and development to ensure proper decomposition of the coffee face mask, along with clear disposal guidelines","Technologies":"Biodegradation testing, environmental impact assessments","People":"Product development team, environmental experts","Owner":"R&D department, environmental sustainability team"},{"Description":"Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","Impact":"Increased health risks for wearers and decreased trust in the product","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and certification of the mask's effectiveness against air particulate matter, and transparent communication of the results","Technologies":"Particle filtration testing, certification standards","People":"Consumers, general public","Owner":"Product development team, quality assurance team"}]}
